name: Maya, Alderaanian Agent
description: When she meets the players she has already taken 10 wounds and has the “At the Brink” Critical injury.
notes: These are not official stats. Credits go to Jeff Greening, for converting the SWSE adventure to EotE.

name: Imperial Stormtrooper (DoD)
description: These stormtroopers are solely concerned with capturing Maya, the Alderaanian Security agent. They are trigger happy, though, and are more than willing to shoot anyone who stands in their way. When the encounter begins, they attempt to stun Maya but use lethal force against any other opponents.
notes: These are official stats, used for Dawn of Defiance. Credits go to Jeff Greening, for converting the SWSE adventure to EotE.

name: Intelligence Agent (DoD)
description: The Imperial informants have bought into the Empire’s propaganda and are willing to risk their lives to help bring enemies of the state to justice. Unlike the stormtroopers, they don’t realize that Maya is wanted alive and use lethal force against her. However, when the heroes intervene, the informants ignore Maya and focus solely on the heroes.
notes: These are not official stats. Credits go to Jeff Greening, for converting the SWSE adventure to EotE.

name: Gamorrean Thug (DoD)
notes: These are not official stats. Credits go to Jeff Greening, for converting the SWSE adventure to EotE.

name: Switch, 3rd Degree Protocol Droid
description: When she meets the players she has already taken 10 wounds and has the “At the Brink” Critical injury.
notes: These are not official stats. Credits go to Jeff Greening, for converting the SWSE adventure to EotE.

name: Switch’s Thugs
notes: These are not official stats. Credits go to Jeff Greening, for converting the SWSE adventure to EotE.

name: Ganga Lor
description:
Ganga Lor is a Chevin petty crime lord who has been engaged in a rivalry with Switch for years. Ganga Lor came to the station around the same time as Switch, and the two have never gotten along.

This massive Chevin looks old, even for his species. His trunk hangs low and scars cross his face, giving him a weathered look that matches his leathery skin. His clothes are little more than rags, and a large blaster pistol pokes out from beneath his vest as though ready to be drawn on a moment’s notice.
notes: These are not official stats. Credits go to Jeff Greening, for converting the SWSE adventure to EotE.

name: Ganga Lor’s Thugs
description: Lor’s thugs have no real strategy to their actions. they are straight-up fighters who care little for complex tactics.
notes: These are not official stats. Credits go to Jeff Greening, for converting the SWSE adventure to EotE.

name: Stormtrooper Sergeant (DoD)
description: Stormtroopers who survive engagements with high marks are promoted to the position of sergeant. Typically this involves command of a single squadron, but stormtroopers who excel at leadership are promoted to higher ranks. Such positions can include supervision of entire companies of stormtroopers. Rank within the stormtrooper legions is difficult for outsiders to fully understand, as they refer to virtually any officer from their ranks as commander. The uniformity of their armour and this tendency for vague references helps to enforce the image of stormtroopers as an absolutely faceless, monolithic military entity, which only serves to enhance their fearsome reputation.

name: Captain Sirona Okeefe
notes: These are not official stats. Credits go to Jeff Greening, for converting the SWSE adventure to EotE.
